start_date.description: Date to start pulling statcast information
start_date.notes: Be careful to not specify too long of a date range.

end_date.description: Date to quit pulling statcast information
end_date.notes: Be careful to not specify too long of a date range.

pitcher.description: Name of pitcher to pull data on
pitcher.notes: Make sure the name of the pitcher is correct. A good place to reference this is baseball-reference.com

batter.description: Name of batter to pull data on
batter.notes: Make sure the name of the batter is correct. A good place to reference this is baseball-reference.com
